title: Warning regarding fraudulent website
body:
A fraudulent website has come to the bank’s attention, purporting to be Deutsche Capital Management Limited, one of Deutsche Bank’s subsidiaries in Ireland.
The website claimed to offer a high return from an investment account product regulated by the FCA.
Deutsche Bank wishes to make clear that Deutsche Capital Management does not offer deposit products and does not currently have its own website.
The bank has taken appropriate action against the website, including steps to have it taken down. The police and regulators have also been informed.
If you have any queries, please contact anti.fraud-UK@db.com.
